log_datadir_as_artifact[source]

log_datadir_as_artifact(wandb_run, path_to_dir, artifact_name, artifact_type='dataset')

Logs a data directory as an artifact in wandb. wandb_run: wandb.Run object path_to_dir: path to the data directory artifact_name: name of the artifact artifact_type: type of the artifact
